channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 成千上万的哥伦比亚人抗议古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统，抗议尽管他努力与武装团体进行和平谈判，但暴力事件仍继续困扰着这个南美国家。
item.description:
Thousands of Colombians protested against President Gustavo Petro and the violence that has continued to plague the South American country in spite of his efforts to negotiate peace with armed groups https://t.co/qN4p7YBdH0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 7, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔周三晚些时候宣布了一系列消息，标志着总统选举推迟引发的数周危机出现了最新转折，塞内加尔选民最终将于 3 月底前往投票站投票。
item.description:
Senegalese voters should finally head to the polls at the end of March, following a string of announcements late Wednesday marking the latest twist in weeks of crisis triggered by the delay to the presidential election https://t.co/AOzaP1Fcnx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国司法部长梅里克-加兰（Merrick Garland）表示，一名中国软件工程师因涉嫌窃取谷歌人工智能技术而被捕，同时他还秘密为两家中国公司工作。
item.description:
A Chinese software engineer was arrested for allegedly stealing artificial intelligence technology from Google while secretly working for two Chinese companies, US Attorney General Merrick Garland said https://t.co/sBFPAq2chP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据判决，《锈迹斑斑》电影审判中的军械师被认定犯有过失杀人罪
item.description:
Armorer in 'Rust' movie trial found guilty of involuntary manslaughter, according to verdict pic.twitter.com/5TzdW2rKhE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 海地的吉米-"烧烤"-切里泽以革命者自居，很少在没有步枪和备用弹夹的情况下露面。
item.description:
Haiti's Jimmy "Barbecue" Cherizier presents himself as a revolutionary, and is seldom pictured without his rifle and spare clips of ammunition.

The former policeman heads one of the powerful gangs that is ravaging Haiti https://t.co/Qi5yfSWpLW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 🇺🇸 一份特别顾问报告引发了关于美国总统乔-拜登被认定为无受审能力的不实说法。专家称，只有法官才能做出这一认定。
item.description:
🇺🇸 A special counsel's report has inspired false claims that US President Joe Biden was found incompetent to stand trial.

Experts say only a judge can make that determination https://t.co/qn4sDK5Nru

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 6, 2024

item.title: 当《芭比娃娃》获得包括最佳影片在内的八项奥斯卡奖提名时，今年奥斯卡颁奖晚会的组织团队就知道他们需要找谁了：瑞恩-高斯林 他将表演 "我只是肯"
item.description:
When "Barbie" was nominated for eight Academy Awards including best picture, the team organizing this year's Oscars gala knew exactly who they needed to approach: Ryan Gosling who will be performing "I'm Just Ken."https://t.co/2BhYF2nyiV

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 智利于 2022 年通过了一项法律，规定 "女性自杀 "为犯罪行为，即妇女因遭受性别暴力或被煽动自杀而导致死亡。
item.description:
The death of two women were triggers for a Chilean law passed in 2022 that created the crime of "femicidal suicide" -- when a woman takes her life as a result of being the victim of gender-based violence, or is incited to kill herself https://t.co/wCZ3FYkLlX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 哈拉-哈泽姆-哈马达（Hala Hazem Hamada），15 岁，在与以色列士兵发生致命交火后被困在瓦砾堆中，经过三天的磨难后获救。
item.description:
Hala Hazem Hamada, age 15, was rescued after a three-day ordeal trapped under rubble following a deadly encounter with Israeli soldiers that claimed the lives of six relatives including her parent https://t.co/PFvx2foUao

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 南非请求国际法院就以色列进攻加沙造成的 "大范围饥荒 "对以色列实施新的紧急措施
item.description:
South Africa petitioned the International Court of Justice to impose fresh emergency measures on Israel over what it described as the "widespread starvation" resulting from its Gaza offensive https://t.co/N8wt85j7hy pic.twitter.com/imm3ajGBy6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统在一次对高中生的演讲中表示，他认为堕胎是 "谋杀"，而堕胎在阿根廷是合法的。
item.description:
President Javier Milei said he considers abortion, which is legal in Argentina, to be "murder", in a speech to high school students https://t.co/SUv9ZlNZCX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 各候选人在共和党初选中获胜的州，包括 "超级星期二 "宣布的结果#AFPgraphics
item.description:
States won by each candidate in the Republican primaries, including declared results from Super Tuesday#AFPgraphics pic.twitter.com/KXCrjN6g9O

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司宣布将 3 月 14 日作为其巨型星际飞船火箭下一次试射的最早日期。
item.description:
Elon Musk's SpaceX announced it was eyeing March 14 as the earliest date for the next test launch of its giant Starship rocket, with which it hopes to one day colonize Mars https://t.co/QGs7XCERVc pic.twitter.com/xjERh5XaWz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国国会议员将投票通过一项巨额议案，以结束联邦预算问题上的长期争论，该议案将为几个主要联邦机构提供资金，直至秋季，从而避免了将于周末开始的部分停摆。
item.description:
US lawmakers are set to vote to end a long-running row over the federal budget with a giant bill to fund several major federal agencies through the fall, averting a partial shutdown due to start at the weekend https://t.co/gAi9oZwiVf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉执政党的一位高级官员说，他 "毫不怀疑 "尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统将在定于 7 月 28 日举行的选举中成为他们的候选人
item.description:
A senior Venezuelan ruling party official said he "had no doubt" President Nicolas Maduro would be their candidate in elections set for July 28 https://t.co/cqxGCGPkvx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 上个月死于狱中的俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在 2020 年之前未公开的证词中预言，他的死亡将 "不会改变任何事情"，其他人将取代他的位置。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny, the Russian opposition leader who died in prison last month, predicted in previously unpublished testimony in 2020 and released on Wednesday that his death would change "nothing" and other people would stand in his place https://t.co/EHYzTBv7Rc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 总部位于科威特的 Alshaya 集团表示，由于 "贸易形势严峻"，在因加沙战争而抵制西方品牌的背景下，该集团将裁减其星巴克中东特许经营店的工作岗位。
item.description:
The Kuwait-based Alshaya Group says it will cut jobs from its Starbucks Middle East franchise due to "challenging trading conditions" amid a boycott of Western brands over the Gaza war https://t.co/uGNtFQZpiO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 加拿大中央银行将其关键贷款利率维持在 5%，表示尽管最近物价跌至目标范围内，但仍对通货膨胀感到担忧
item.description:
Canada's central bank holds its key lending rate at five percent, saying it remains concerned about inflation even though prices recently fell to within its target range https://t.co/e0uIBN0BZP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 莎米拉-亚达夫曾经是印度农村地区的一名家庭主妇，她一直想成为一名飞行员，现在她正在远程实现自己的梦想，驾驶一架重型无人机在天空中耕耘印度风景如画的农田。
item.description:
Once a housewife in rural India, Sharmila Yadav always wanted to be a pilot and is now living her dream remotely, flying a heavy-duty drone across the skies to cultivate the country's picturesque farmlands https://t.co/Z8auY8UHGV pic.twitter.com/0r6v7l7YCh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 美国立法者向 TikTok 施压，要求其断绝与中国母公司字节跳动的关系，否则将面临禁令，这是在更大范围内推动社交媒体应用程序不受外国对手控制的举措
item.description:
US lawmakers move to pressure TikTok to sever ties with its Chinese parent company ByteDance or face a ban, in a broader push to keep social media apps out of foreign adversaries' control https://t.co/boIbKtMaFq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 纽约称将在全市地铁部署国民警卫队和警察，原因是为美国最大都市服务的地铁网络暴力事件激增
item.description:
New York says it will deploy National Guard troops and police across the city subway due to surging violence on the network serving the United States' largest metropolis https://t.co/nm6fKPwXZK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在一项全面的新法律生效的前一天，欧盟竞争事务主管表示，欧盟准备动用全部武器迫使大型科技公司改变其网络行为。
item.description:
The EU is prepared to deploy its full arsenal to force big tech companies to change their behaviour online, the bloc's competition chief said, the day before a sweeping new law comes into force https://t.co/GTwKhhuZZn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #UPDATE 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周三表示，她将在纽约市地铁上部署该州的国民警卫队和警察，因为在为美国最大的大都市服务的地铁网络上发生的暴力事件有所上升 ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE New York Governor Kathy Hochul said Wednesday she would deploy the state's National Guard troops and police onto the New York City subway after upticks in violent incidents on the network serving the United States' largest metropolis ➡️https://t.co/syZmYhA25i pic.twitter.com/b9ipF1ioA5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #最新消息#周三，抗议者在示威游行中撞开了墨西哥总统府的一扇门，要求为近十年前失踪的 43 名学生伸张正义，他们的行为震惊了整个国家 ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE Protesters broke down a door to Mexico's presidential palace on Wednesday during a demonstration demanding justice for 43 students whose disappearance nearly a decade ago shocked the country ➡️ https://t.co/1jFKuJImFF pic.twitter.com/u8xyF1dFWU

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 "超级星期二 "初选中大败而归，他的共和党最后竞争对手尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）在周三向11月与乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的激烈复选迈进 ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE Donald Trump marched on Wednesday towards a bitter rematch against President Joe Biden in November as his final Republican rival Nikki Haley threw in the towel after a thumping defeat in the "Super Tuesday" primaries ➡️ https://t.co/g24jLZZhrZ pic.twitter.com/QRNBly2kZW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #最新消息#一名战争监督员称，被认为与叙利亚境内的伊斯兰国组织有关联的枪手周三杀害了18名在该国沙漠中寻找松露的人 ➡️
item.description:
#UPDATE Gunmen thought to be linked to the Islamic State group in Syria killed 18 people searching for truffles in the country's desert on Wednesday, a war monitor said ➡️ https://t.co/gK8HNGQIqK pic.twitter.com/UBoxrR9fGt

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇧🇴 玻利维亚原住民妇女学习跆拳道，反对暴力一次潜在劫匪的袭击将莉迪亚-梅塔（Lidia Mayta）引向了武术。三年后，她帮助培训其他土著妇女保护自己。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇧🇴 Indigenous Bolivian women take up taekwondo against violence

An attack by would-be robbers steered Lidia Mayta towards the martial art. Three years later, she helps train other Indigenous women to defend themselves.

📹 Esther MAMANI
📷 Aizar RALDES#AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/zzm8arZdcp

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 俄罗斯金融监督机构周三将国际象棋大师、政治活动家加里-卡斯帕罗夫（Garry Kasparov）列入 "恐怖分子和极端分子 "名单 ⬇️
item.description:
#UPDATE Russia's financial watchdog on Wednesday added chess grandmaster and political activist Garry Kasparov to its list of "terrorists and extremists" ⬇️ https://t.co/7dZbcAq37v

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #示威者冲破墨西哥总统府大门：墨西哥电视台
item.description:
#BREAKING Demonstrators break down door of Mexico's presidential palace: Mexican TV pic.twitter.com/sof7sOeV9L

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024

item.title: #拜登和特朗普都呼吁支持海莉参加白宫竞选
item.description:
#BREAKING Biden, Trump both call for backing of Haley supporters in White House race pic.twitter.com/a86BgUEFKS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 6, 2024
